description.narrative: By the end of 2014, (disaggregated) quality data and analyses on the evolution of the situation of women and children are available, used and regularly updated, which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Economic and social policies and programs are monitored, results based and contribute to the reduction of disparities, vulnerabilities and poverty of children and women

description.narrative: UNICEF support in strengthening the national evaluative capacities through a participatory approach resulted in strategic positioning of the evaluation of public policies in the national agenda through the development of a National Evaluation Capacity Development Strategy and its action plan. | Status:Met | As-of Date:26/03/2018
